# ?? Constitution Quick Reference

## ?? Files Created
- `.github/CONSTITUTION.md` - Main constitution (11 sections)
- `.github/CONSTITUTION_VALIDATION.md` - Validation checklist
- `.github/CONSTITUTION_SUMMARY.md` - This summary

## ? What to Do Now

### 1. Read the Constitution
Open `.github/CONSTITUTION.md` and review all sections.

### 2. Validate It
Open `.github/CONSTITUTION_VALIDATION.md` and:
- Check 11 review areas (? Approved or ? Needs Changes)
- Answer 10 open questions
- Provide feedback

### 3. Tell Me Your Decision

**Option A - Approve:**
```
"Approve the constitution as-is"
```

**Option B - Request Changes:**
```
"Change [Section X.X]: [what to change]"
```

**Option C - Discuss:**
```
"I have questions about [topic]"
```

## ?? Key Decisions Documented

? VB.NET with Option Strict/Explicit On, Infer Off  
? Windows-only, .NET 8.0, WinForms  
? RCH.Forge.* assembly naming  
? TheForge.* namespace convention  
? Layered architecture (UI ? Services ? Core)  
? IModule interface contract for all modules  
? Designer file governance (AI edits .Designer.vb)  
? Documentation taxonomy (Codex, Chronicle, Tomes, etc.)  
? Manual testing via dashboard (no automated tests yet)  
? Character count enforcement in all files
